headline: Compass Point says Cash App is undervalued, starts Block at Buy
summary: Invsting.com -- Compass Point initiated coverage on Block Inc. with a Buy rating and a price target of $80 per share on Wednesday, citing undervaluation of the company’s Cash App business and an expected acceleration in growth during the second half of 2025.

headline: Pegasystems and Macy's have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
summary: Pegasystems sees soaring demand and AI-driven growth, while Macy's struggles with declining sales and analyst downgrades.

raw.headline: Pegasystems and Macy's have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day

headline: Why Block Stock Zoomed 10% Higher in June
summary: It also demonstrated that it's innovating in the product sphere with a new handheld device.  Block (NYSE: XYZ) had a decent, if unspectacular, June, ultimately emerging from the month with a 10% gain in share price.  In the opening days of the month, Block earned a recommendation upgrade from Evercore ISI, whose analyst Adam Frisch ticked up his rating to outperform (buy, in other words) from in line (hold).
